caption:
“Obedience is the root of peace.”

Reflection:
The obedient heart rests easily, for it carries no rebellion. Peace blooms where will aligns with grace.

Commentary:
This line reminds us that obedience to God is freedom, not constraint. When the will is surrendered, turmoil gives way to calm.
